Group Captain Adebayo Hamed Lawal (amụrụ na 14 Septemba 1941) bụ Gọvanọ nke Benue State, Nigeria site na July 1978 ruo October 1979 n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha nke General Olusegun Obasanjo.
A mụrụ Adebayo Hamed Lawal na Septemba 14, 1941, na Offa, Kwara State
Ọ debanyere aha na ndị agha ụgbọelu Naijiria na 1963 ma zụọ ya dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọelu na West Germany, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1964
Ọrụ gụnyere Commander, Port Harcourt Base (1969-1970), Commander Kano Base (1972-1973) na (1975-1977) na Commander.

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Gọvanọ Ndị Agha nke Benue Steeti na July 1978, na-ejide ọkwá ahụ ruo Ọktoba 1979.
Ọ lekọtara mgbanwe udo site na ọchịchị ndị agha gaa na ọchịchị obodo, na-enyefe ike n'aka onye otu national party of Nigeria aper aku na 1 Ọktoba 1979.
